title: hermann miller vs humanscale
content: aye people, i was just wondering which chair you guys favor, the aeron chair by hm or the liberty by humanscale. the liberty seems to be less bulky and maybe lighter. my family runs an office furniture business so i will check more details tommorrow. any advice on the subject would be greatly appreciated, thanks in advance.
author: SHOEBACCA

comments.content: The fabric on the Aeron tends to grind up clothing. It's like a microfine cheesegrater!. Long term users often find it coated with a fine lint dust, about the time they discover their jacket has become quite threadbare.
come to think of it, i've gone through a lot of pants in the last two years

Jacket? Pants? Didn't you guys read the part in the Aeron manual  
about its gentle, soothing exfoliation feature? Because you deserve it!
